name: SNAC-MAN (AverageJoe)
description: SNAC-MAN is a prototype arcade-style game which has players collect food in a maze to satiate the appetite of an obnoxious red goblin creature. Collect booze to gain perks which will help you navigate sixteen regular levels, four boss levels and an endless survival mode. Avoid a wide range of enemies, solve puzzles and escape to the next stage before your greed gets the better of you.
